name: ahisoft
overview:
aHisoft was founded in 2009, aHisoft is a creative and passionate team, comprising highly-trained and experienced professionals - developers, designers, marketers, and technical support specialists - who are dedicated to bringing the best possible multimedia experience to even the most demanding customers. We also work with a number of independent specialists who bring added depth and breadth to the products and services we offer.

We tenaciously adhere to the mission of becoming a leader in developing and delivering state-of-the-art, stable and focused software solutions for individuals, businesses and development engineers around the globe to process Flash, graphics and images, audio and video with the ambition to enrich their business value, maximize their productivity and diversify their lives.

aHisoft is the ultimate solution for all kinds of video and audio conversion needs that enables you to forget about media format incompatibilities and simply enjoy your video or audio any time, any place, on any device.
